properties.description: no output data, probably because the sampling of the database is only 1000, try change debug settings, don't recommend cuz slow.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> odsDB
source(output(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> intergrationDB
odsDB derive(IsActive = 1) ~> addingisactive
odsDB, Select3 lookup(OrderLineID == SQL_OrderLineID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_OrderLineID)) ~> existingRow
Select4 derive(SQL_IsActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
intergrationDB select(mapColumn(
		SQL_OrderLineID = OrderLineID,
		SQL_OrderID = OrderID,
		SQL_StockItemID = StockItemID,
		SQL_Description = Description,
		SQL_PackageTypeID = PackageTypeID,
		SQL_Quantity = Quantity,
		SQL_UnitPrice = UnitPrice,
		SQL_TaxRate = TaxRate,
		SQL_PickedQuantity = PickedQuantity,
		SQL_PickingCompletedWhen = PickingCompletedWhen,
		SQL_LastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		SQL_LastEditedWhen = LastEditedWhen,
		SQL_IsActive = IsActive,
		Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
existingRow select(mapColumn(
		SQL_OrderLineID,
		SQL_OrderID,
		SQL_StockItemID,
		SQL_Description,
		SQL_PackageTypeID,
		SQL_Quantity,
		SQL_UnitPrice,
		SQL_TaxRate,
		SQL_PickedQuantity,
		SQL_PickingCompletedWhen,
		SQL_LastEditedBy,
		SQL_LastEditedWhen,
		SQL_IsActive,
		SQL_Surrogate = Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
addingisactive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> intergrationPlusAct
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderLineID as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		PickedQuantity as integer,
		PickingCompletedWhen as timestamp,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Surrogate'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderLineID = SQL_OrderLineID,
		OrderID = SQL_OrderID,
		StockItemID = SQL_StockItemID,
		Description = SQL_Description,
		PackageTypeID = SQL_PackageTypeID,
		Quantity = SQL_Quantity,
		UnitPrice = SQL_UnitPrice,
		TaxRate = SQL_TaxRate,
		PickedQuantity = SQL_PickedQuantity,
		PickingCompletedWhen = SQL_PickingCompletedWhen,
		LastEditedBy = SQL_LastEditedBy,
		LastEditedWhen = SQL_LastEditedWhen,
		IsActive = SQL_IsActive,
		Surrogate = SQL_Surrogate
	)) ~> sink1
